name: player receiving with nfl_games table params
description: Test case for player receiving with nfl_games table params
expected_query: with "t303260eb4dd96266f063b0bee99c7df9" as (select COALESCE(trg_pid) as pid, SUM(CASE WHEN comp = true THEN recv_yds ELSE 0 END) as rec_yds_from_plays from "nfl_plays" inner join "nfl_games" on "nfl_games"."esbid" = "nfl_plays"."esbid" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2024) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') and "nfl_games"."day" in ('MN') group by COALESCE(trg_pid)) select "player"."pid", "t303260eb4dd96266f063b0bee99c7df9"."rec_yds_from_plays" AS "rec_yds_from_plays_0", "player"."pos" from "player" left join "t303260eb4dd96266f063b0bee99c7df9" on "t303260eb4dd96266f063b0bee99c7df9"."pid" = "player"."pid" group by "t303260eb4dd96266f063b0bee99c7df9"."rec_yds_from_plays", "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 2 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
